name: Darn Tough Eclipse Crew Socks - Unisex
description: Fade out boring socks. The Eclipse Crew Socks are made with merino blend that keeps them itch-free and allows them to breathe. Seamless construction provides a smooth fit and assures no slipping, no bunching, and no blistersMade of fine-gauge merino wool, nylon and spandex to keep you cool in the summer, warm in winter.Merino is naturally antimicrobial and keeps your feet from getting funky.True Seamless™ construction fuses seams for chafe-free wear.Darn Tough sources its wool from non-mulesed sheep.
